text.section: Nothing herein shall be construed to preclude the optional use of administrative regulations promulgated under this section on behalf of employees enumerated in KRS 18A.115(1)(a), (b), (d), (e), (p), (u), and (w) and on behalf of members of state boards and commissions who work on a full-time, salaried basis.

Months of service earned as a contract employee of the Kentucky Department of Education shall be recognized and credited as service credit for calculating years of service in any public agency position held subsequent to the employment by contract. The provisions of this subsection are retroactive for employees hired in a public agency position on or after January 1, 1997.
